function.name: estimate_daily_calories
function.long_description: Estimates the daily calorie intake required to maintain body weight based on age, gender, height, weight, and physical activity level using a standard metabolic formula.

gender.description: Gender of the person (male or female)

activity_level.description: Activity level (sedentary, light, moderate, active, very active)

example_user_queries: How many calories should I eat daily?
Daily calorie requirement for a 30-year-old male
How many calories do I need to maintain weight?
Calorie needs for female with moderate activity
How many calories should I consume per day?
Estimate calories based on activity level
